display_long_description:
**Your next gen plank walking simulator**, set high up in New York City, designed to maximize the Quest hardware, at the introductory price of just $5.99 (USD). It's the perfect experience to show off your new headset!
[media]
# The Ultimate Welcome To VR
Bring friends and family together for great laughs as everyone’s knees go weak on a thin plank atop the One Astor Plaza skyscraper!
[media]
# Next Gen Realism
We set out to push the limits of what the most realistic plank simulator could be on next gen Quest hardware.
[media]
# Plank Variety
6 plank variations including: Wood Plank, Glass Plank, Metal Grate, The Pole, Red Light Green Light and Roulette. More to come!
[media]
# Two Environments Included and Counting!
[media]
# Health and Safety Warning
All users must refer to the in-game EULA and Safety Guidelines to limit the risk of injury or harm when walking the virtual plank.

**Your next gen plank walking simulator**, set high up in New York City, designed to maximize the Quest hardware, at the introductory price of just $5.99 (USD). It's the perfect experience to show off your new headset!

# The Ultimate Welcome To VR
Bring friends and family together for great laughs as everyone’s knees go weak on a thin plank atop the One Astor Plaza skyscraper!
![{"height":420,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/75300188_1355526652351506_2178293079657922896_n.mp4?_nc_cat=103&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=U3YClyfGBmcQ7kNvwFDe3oI&_nc_oc=AdkpcHj42gZpB6FEkPoR_tqNvJLAaN31qofpb_-pLMHrkJbcfttd71Mq0yhsRE8G2BA&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=Gg_DVoHXOdXWeT7hh9WsFA&oh=00_AfG3KDFq2RbFB745OGjEOqQEghcMF1pdZWYlz3EOvn_iQA&oe=680702E4)
# Next Gen Realism
We set out to push the limits of what the most realistic plank simulator could be on next gen Quest hardware.
![{"height":420,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/39031656_569899209002816_7347204436020726564_n.mp4?_nc_cat=106&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=vYPVRca8KxsQ7kNvwFfG3sm&_nc_oc=AdlB8jsvje9PHcuuvQ0bYAhanegoX-vE3YqxgPBqgZ261OucndKUWA2EqTmCJSitzxU&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=Gg_DVoHXOdXWeT7hh9WsFA&oh=00_AfFoT81oiNeuNmVOYXEFKs2N-6poHaaFCGiWnmaQxb-g7g&oe=68072232)
# Plank Variety
6 plank variations including: Wood Plank, Glass Plank, Metal Grate, The Pole, Red Light Green Light and Roulette. More to come!
![{"height":420,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/38982555_3774236489481402_8390222632881012321_n.mp4?_nc_cat=107&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=XJdjUQfIyl8Q7kNvwHpaZ1S&_nc_oc=AdmSFEl030FW5C5_ikvs7Ivg-fkl6Mk-UDc34nxWxcV8YnaNTQ6T5D-T6Pq_9Wpdnvw&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=Gg_DVoHXOdXWeT7hh9WsFA&oh=00_AfEHzkaPgSigY0HcGfFIki7JoRz6eouphL4UpV89W14O2w&oe=680700C5)

All users must refer to the in-game EULA and Safety Guidelines to limit the risk of injury or harm when walking the virtual plank.
